nodes.text: Star Wars: Shadow of Vader would have been a trade paperback collecting the five issues of the now-canceled Marvel Comics miniseries Star Wars: Shadow of Vader, written by Chuck Wendig. The paperback would have been released on July 16, 2019.

Behold the dark legacy of DARTH VADER, the Empire's most sinister enforcer of evil - here, in the earliest days of his Sith-born legacy. On a dark, forgotten world in the Outer Rim, Vader hunts five teenagers after slaughtering their politician parents. Imperial defector Willrow Hood is working on CLOUD CITY when the EMPIRE'S darkest lieutenant, DARTH VADER, shows up with a plan to catch LUKE SKYWALKER - and Hood must find means of escape before he's discovered. How far must Willrow Hood run to escape the long shadow of LORD VADER?
COLLECTING: STAR WARS: SHADOW OF VADER 1-5
